name: Learn to Drive on Moto Wars
name_original: Learn to Drive on Moto Wars
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Learn to Drive on Moto Wars - will remind you what is a real adrenaline! On the vast expanses of roads, many dangers await you, overcome by a bike.

You have to participate in the survival races, where you'll fight hundreds of other riders who will do everything to make you lose.

Use weapons in battle for championship! This is real war! There is no place for the weak here!

Be strong! And do not give up!

This is a challenge, which not everyone will pass! Believe in yourself! And the victory will be yours!

Controls: (A, W, S, D) Fast driving (Shift) Shooting (Left and Right Mouse Button)
